The churches duty, for received mercies. Discovered in a sermon preached before the Honourable House of Commons: at Margarets Westminster, Feb. 24. 1646. being the day of the solemne monthly fast. / By John Greene Minister of Gods Word, and a member of the Assembly of Divines. Greene, John, Master of Arts.
[8], 36 p.
Printed by F.B. for Philemon Stephens, and are to bee sold at his shop at the gilded Lion in Pauls Church-Yard, London : 1647.
With a preliminary imprimatur leaf. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
